channel.title: JavaScript on Andy Dyer!
channel.description: Recent content in JavaScript on Andy Dyer!

item.title: A Functional Queue in JavaScript
item.description: It's been over a year since I've posted here, but I've been busy delving into Android and Ruby on Rails among other things. To get back into blogging (hopefully more regularly...we'll see), I thought I'd share an interesting JavaScript exercise I was asked to complete as part of a job interview recently. The task was to build a functional queue in JavaScript. A functional queue is a queue (first in, first out) which is implemented with no side-effects.
